product_name: Brooks Sherpa III Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering lightweight, breathable coverage, the Brooks Sherpa III running shorts are designed keep you feeling cool and comfortable mile after mile. Shorts and liner briefs feature soft, stretchy polyester fabric that wicks away moisture and dries quickly. Elastic waist with internal drawcord provides a secure fit; 4.5 in. inseam offers just-right coverage. Brooks Sherpa III shorts feature 2 rear holster fuel pockets that carry up to 3 energy gels each. Closeout.
short_description: Offering lightweight, breathable coverage, the Brooks Sherpa III running shorts are designed keep you feeling cool and comfortable mile after mile.
